statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Rashawn Thomas had 22 points, 12 rebounds and three blocks Wednesday night and Texas A&M-Corpus Christi beat Lamar 69-66 in overtime.
article.headline: Texas A&M-Corpus Christi 69, Lamar 66 in OT
article.linkText: Texas A&M-Corpus Christi 69, Lamar 66 in OT
article.story: BEAUMONT, Texas -- Rashawn Thomas had 22 points, 12 rebounds and three blocks Wednesday night and Texas A&M-Corpus Christi beat Lamar 69-66 in overtime. The Islanders (10-9, 3-5 Southland Conference) took the lead for good on Jake Kocher's 3-pointer with 2:32 left to make it 65-64. Kocher, who finished with a career-high-tying 19 points, added a layup to make it 67-64 with 1:49 left. The Cardinals (12-9, 4-4) closed the deficit back to one but missed three 3-point attempts in the final 37 seconds. Texas A&M-CC took its first lead in over 13 minutes when Thomas made it 60-59 with 59 seconds left in the second half. Colton Weisbrod made the first of two free throws with 32 seconds left to send it to overtime. Joseph Kilgore added 14 points and Ehab Amin had 12 for the Islanders. Weisbrod led the Cardinals with 14 points. Zjori Bosha and Marcus Owens scored 12 each.
